before: The investment objective of the scheme is to invest in stocks
of companies comprising Nifty 50 Index and endeavor to
achieve returns equivalent to the Nifty by ·passive· investment.
The scheme will be managed by replicating the Index in the
same weightage as in the Nifty 50 Index with the intention of
minimizing the performance differences between the scheme
and the Nifty 50 Index in capital terms, subject to market
liquidity, costs of trading, management expenses and other
factors which may cause tracking error. There is no assurance
that the Investment Objective of the Scheme will be achieved.
